action.action-desc: Mr. Massie (for himself, Mrs. Boebert, Mr. Biggs, Mr. Brooks, Mr. Clyde, Mr. Comer, Mr. Duncan, Mr. Gaetz, Mr. Gohmert, Mr. Gosar, Mrs. Greene of Georgia, Mr. Hice of Georgia, Mr. LaMalfa, Mr. McClintock, Mr. Mooney, Mr. Rosendale, Mr. Roy, and Mrs. Miller of Illinois) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To repeal the Gun-Free School Zones Act of 1990 and amendments to that Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Safe Students Act.

section.header: Repeal of the Gun-Free School Zones Act of 1990 and amendments to that Act

subsection.text: Section 922 of title 18, United States Code, is amended by striking subsection (q).

paragraph.text: Section 921(a) of such title is amended by striking paragraphs (25) through (27) and redesignating paragraphs (28), (29), and (32) through (35) as paragraphs (25) through (30), respectively.
Section 924(a) of such title is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1)(B), by striking (k), or (q) and inserting or (k); and
by striking paragraph (4) and redesignating paragraphs (5) through (7) as paragraphs (4) through (6), respectively.

paragraph.text: The Gun-Free School Zones Act of 1990 (18 U.S.C. 921 note, 922 note; section 1702 of Public Law 101–647; 104 Stat. 4844–4845) is repealed.
